output_list.reason: The 'mint' function does not prevent overflow, allowing a user to mint an arbitrary large number of tokens.
The minting function does not incorporate randomness, making it predictable and exploitable.
The 'setMintAgent' function allows anyone to set minting agents, potentially leading to unauthorized minting.
The 'upgrade' function does not prevent overflow, allowing a user to upgrade an arbitrary large amount of tokens.
The 'setUpgradeAgent' function allows anyone to set the upgrade agent, potentially leading to unauthorized upgrades.
